post:
Temok is providing high-quality Web Hosting solutions since 2014. Our Aim at Temok is to provide top notch managed hosting services at the best price as well as the highest customers pleasure. Our Virtual Private Servers are setup on powerful main nodes with fantastic connectivity to make certain that each VPS delivers optimum performance and offers the freedom to run big websites and install third party applications with complete ease. In terms of VPS hosting management is concerned, all of the VPS Hosting plans are fully managed*. VPS hosting management includes setup, software installation, security supervision and 24/7 Technical Support which helps clients concentrate a lot more on the success of their organization.



​




At the moment we are offering four different USA VPS Hosting Plans in an effort to make sure that we have something for everyone. Below you will find some details of these plans.

↠↠↠ USA VPS Starter Plan ↞↞↞

⟣ RAM: 1GB
⟣ RAID-10 Disk Space: 40GB
⟣ CPU Cores: 2
⟣ Premium Bandwidth: 1000GB
⟣ Port Speed :1Gigabit
⟣ IPv6 Addresses Included: 1
⟣ Price Starts at $22.95/month

We have got excellent hardware accompanied by an exceptional support staff. At Temok you will enjoy the experience. We strive to provide service which is not only satisfying but exciting. We work beyond your expectation and go the extra mile to accomplish your expectations.
